category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ME_check_lines_below_consumed
preference.preference_description: Activates the Product BOM traversal while processing the children of consumed lines in Bill Of Process (BOP). This would be needed if a line below a consumed line is suppressed in BOM and is not expected to be visible in BOP. A noticeable performance impact exists if the value is set to true. The default value is false.
